Asl

Class Asl

  • java.lang.Object
    • Asl.Asl

  • public class Asl
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Asl implement the main function of the interpreter. It accepts a set of options to generate the AST in dot format and avoid the execution of the program. To know about the accepted options, run the command Asl -help.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String astfile
      Name of the file representing the AST.
      private static boolean dotformat
      Flag indicating that the AST must be written in dot format.
      private static boolean execute
      Flag to indicate whether the program must be executed after parsing.
      private static java.lang.String infile
      The file name of the program.
      private static java.lang.String tracefile
      Name of the file storing the trace of the program.

      • readOptions

        private static boolean readOptions(java.lang.String[] args)
        Function to parse the command line. It defines some of the attributes of the class. It returns true if the parsing hass been successful, and false otherwise.
